content: designed to lay on her back this purrmaid was inspired by the whatif creations purrmaid drawing her head body and tail are made in one piece the shape is created through clever use of different crochet stitches - no bending or clever trickery for the photographs your purrmaid will also automatically have the same curved shape materials needed 1 x 50g ball scheepjes stone washed in moon stone variegated yarn of your choice less than 50g required for tail a scrap of black & a scrap of pink dk yarn 3 5mm hook stuffing stitch marker optional but advised needle scissors size completed purrmaid is approximately 9 inches from ears to bottom excluding the curved over tail when using recommended yarn and hook size difficulty with lots of photographs to help you along the way this pattern is ideal for adventurous beginners to help advance their skills and advanced crocheters alike stitches used magic_ring / circle single_crochet increase invisible decrease half_double_crochet double_crochet 5 together bobble stitch fsc foundation single_crochet slip_stitch links to tutorials on special stitches and techniques are provided in the pattern this crochet purrmaid pattern comes with permission to sell your items got a question i m happy to help just drop me a message i would love to see any finished items you make - you can find me on facebook https //www facebook com/hookedbyrobin or with the hashtag #hookedbyrobin on instagram i am @puddnhead
